p: Combined lymphadenectomy, the maximum diameter of the thyroid gland, and PTH on the first day after surgery (d1PTH) were associated with long-term hypoparathyroidism ( P < 0.05). The OR value of combined lymphadenectomy was 1.594, 95% CI was (0.586, 4.334); The OR value of Maximum thyroid diameter was 1.254, 95% CI was (0.794, 1.981), the OR value of d1PTH was 1.199, and 95% CI was (1.086, 1.324) ( Table 3).
